tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    total_sales INT,
    total_orders INT
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES MenuItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES MenuItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    popular_item_id INT,
    total_orders INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (popular_item_id) REFERENCES MenuItems(item_id)
);
